attributes.action: Make to the House of the Lords a honarinary post without pay
attributes.additional_details: To take the lead in replacing the money we have borrowed
attributes.background:
Stop paying tax free "daily"  expenses commensurate with a "weekly" taxed working wage in other parts of the country  
"They" do not need the money
Just greed

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for.

The House of Lords is responsible for the allowances and expenses paid to members of the House of Lords. You can find out more here:

http://www.parliament.uk/business/lords/whos-in-the-house-of-lords/house-of-lords-expenses/
